misc: Primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event.
biography: Toni, a distinguished figure in the world of golf, hails from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club. Beyond his prowess on the course, Toni is the primary organizer of the Hector Trophée event, demonstrating his commitment to the sport.

A competitor in all eleven past editions of the Hector Trophée, Toni's dedication is beyond question. With three victories in the Hector Trophée and two individual Victor titles to his name, Toni has proven his skill time and time again.

Known for his calm demeanor and strategic mind, Toni is a formidable opponent in both individual and pair formats. As he prepares for his twelfth appearance in the Hector Trophée in 2025, all eyes will be on Toni as he seeks to add to his impressive record.
